overview: Heather Hunter, the most exotic sex kitten in porn, shows off her dancer's body in this latest Judy Blue production with sultry red-haired jaqueline, pretty newcomer Kelly Royce and the smoldering Cameo, all in a story that'll dance your pants off.  It's flashier than Flashdance, dirtier than Dirty Dancing and makes the lambada look like a sweet promenade.  Look out Don Cornelius, the Performance is about to begin...
tagline: Get On The Real Soul Train.
title: Performance
